1.name: Allure
1.details:
When not in combat, Kiyomi's next basic attack gains additional range and deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power).

It also marks the enemy for a short duration, causing the target to deal less damage to Kiyomi.

2.name: Bewitching Dance
2.details:
Kiyomi dances in a series of spins, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies and briefly slowing them.

Bewitching Dance can be cast three times in a short time frame and the movement speed reduction can be stacked.

3.name: Fox Fire
3.details:
Kiyomi sends out a flaming fox in a target location and it will travel to there by the shortest path while providing vision around.

If it spots an enemy Hero, it will run toward the target and explodes on the first enemy contact, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies and revealing them for a while.

If no enemy hero is nearby, fox fire will stay still and explode after a few seconds.

4.name: Lover's Call
4.details: Kiyomi leaps to an ally Hero, shielding both the target and herself (scaling with magical power) for a few seconds upon arrival.

5.name: Cursed Embrace
5.details: Kiyomi sends out a charming wave, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) and charms all enemies hit, causing them to walk towards Kiyomi for a few seconds and take increased damage from Kiyomi.
